item.title: Exile718 rsps
item.dc:creator: @exile718 exile718
item.description:
@exile718 wrote:

[CENTER]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AMNs4SyRAM8

[SIZE=5]Important Information:[/SIZE]

On Exile 718 forums and the server. It is important to respect each other, and always strive to be a better person than you may be, or already are. If you respect the other members, the other staff, and the rules you will help in our goal of becoming not just a server but a community.
?We offer you the most mature and professional staff and constant updates that the players want.
Here is a list of some of our features, I will show some pictures towards the end of this thread.

[SIZE=5]Links:[/SIZE]

Forums: Index of Exile718
Jar Dowmload: http://www.exile718.com/exile718.jar
Auto-Vote: Exile718 - Voting
Auto-Donate: Donate for Exile718

[SIZE=5]Content:[/SIZE]

  • Thieving stall xp table issues should be fixed now;
  • slayer task changing can be done with cash now;
  • ::Mode Command added, which show Your current Xp mode;
  • Xp modes;
  • Off-hands;
  • Donator zone;
  • Extreme donator zone;
  • Vipzone;
  • Donator boss;
  • Chaotics claws;
  • Taniing system. Talk to Ellis at home to Tan hides;
  • PestQueen added into game. Do ::Pq To get her;
  • Ganodermic / Grifolic / Fungale / Polypore staff making like real Rs, Also working on degrade system;
  • Whip & Dark bow coloring system into Game;
  • Celestial Armour;
  • Zephyrium Armour;
  • Handcannon;
  • Cannooners;
  • All skills working;
  • Item Lending working 100%;
  • Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack;
  • Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage;
  • Flowering Dicing for Hosting Gambling;
  • Custom Dungeoneering System;
  • Recipe for Disaster;
  • Glacors with Working Minions, Double HP Bars;
  • Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around);
  • All Bosses with good Drop Rates;
  • Server Notified when Users get a good Drop;
  • Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins;
  • Nice ways to make money;
  • Clan Chat System;
  • Working Notes;
  • Daily updates;
  • Vorago, Party Beast;
    [SIZE=5]
    Minigames:[/SIZE]

-100% Soulwars working like RuneScape;

  • Warrior Guild with Defender Drops;
  • Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape;
  • Fight Caves (63 Waves);
  • Fight Kiln (36 Waves);
  • Dominion Tower with Dominion Factor Points and Shop;
  • Duel Arena Working just Like RuneScape;
  • Pest Control Working Exactly Like RuneScape (100%);

Hope to see you ingame![/CENTER]
